entry.title: Stephen: +Alpine skiing, -Neighboring Star
entry.summary:

← Previous revision Revision as of 22:42, 18 March 2013
Line 8: Line 8:
 
}}
  
}}
 
{{*mp|March 17}} Japanese architect '''[[Toyo Ito]]''' ''(pictured)'' wins the [[Pritzker Architecture Prize|Pritzker Prize]].
  
{{*mp|March 17}} Japanese architect '''[[Toyo Ito]]''' ''(pictured)'' wins the [[Pritzker Architecture Prize|Pritzker Prize]].
  +
{{*mp|March 17}} In [[Alpine skiing]], [[Tina Maze]] and [[Marcel Hirscher]] win the overall women's and men's '''[[2013 Alpine Skiing World Cup|World Cup]]''' titles, respectively.
 
{{*mp|March 16}} In [[Portal:Rugby union|rugby union]], the '''[[2013 Six Nations Championship|Six Nations Championship]]''' concludes with [[Wales national rugby union team|Wales]] winning the tournament for the second consecutive year.
  
{{*mp|March 16}} In [[Portal:Rugby union|rugby union]], the '''[[2013 Six Nations Championship|Six Nations Championship]]''' concludes with [[Wales national rugby union team|Wales]] winning the tournament for the second consecutive year.
 
{{*mp|March 15}} The [[National People's Congress]] of China names '''[[Xi Jinping]]''' as the new [[President of the People's Republic of China|President]] and '''[[Li Keqiang]]''' as the new [[Premier of the People's Republic of China|Premier]].
  
{{*mp|March 15}} The [[National People's Congress]] of China names '''[[Xi Jinping]]''' as the new [[President of the People's Republic of China|President]] and '''[[Li Keqiang]]''' as the new [[Premier of the People's Republic of China|Premier]].
 
{{*mp|March 13}} Jorge Mario Bergoglio of Argentina is [[Papal conclave, 2013|elected]] as '''[[Pope Francis]]''', becoming the first Latin American [[pope]] of the [[Catholic Church]].
  
{{*mp|March 13}} Jorge Mario Bergoglio of Argentina is [[Papal conclave, 2013|elected]] as '''[[Pope Francis]]''', becoming the first Latin American [[pope]] of the [[Catholic Church]].
 
{{*mp|March 12}} [[Japan Oil, Gas and Metals National Corporation|JOGMEC]] announces the first successful extraction of '''[[Methane clathrate|methane hydrate]]''' from seabed deposits.
  
{{*mp|March 12}} [[Japan Oil, Gas and Metals National Corporation|JOGMEC]] announces the first successful extraction of '''[[Methane clathrate|methane hydrate]]''' from seabed deposits.
−
{{*mp|March 11}} A binary [[brown dwarf]] system, '''[[WISE 1049-5319]]''', is observed 6.5{{nbsp}}[[light-year]]s from Earth, making it the [[List of nearest stars|closest star system]] discovered since 1916.
  
   
 
</ul>
  
</ul>

entry.title: Jayron32: fix. Round robin tournament, not elimination. Wales defeated 4 of the 5 other teams.
entry.summary:
fix. Round robin tournament, not elimination. Wales defeated 4 of the 5 other teams.
